invite_friend.title: Invite Friends
invite_friend.description: Earn extra [[:ice]] by inviting your friends.

errors.multiple_accounts: Email/phone number is associated with another account. Please log into that account to prove ownership, then logout and log back into this one. If you do not own that other account or are unable to log into it, please contact our support.
errors.wrong_phone_number: Invalid phone number, please try again.
errors.invalid_validation_code: Invalid code number, please try again!
errors.expired_action_code: OTP in email link has expired.
errors.account_exists_with_different_credential: There already exists an account with the email address asserted by the credential.
errors.invalid_credential: The credentials are malformed or have expired.
errors.operation_not_allowed: The type of account corresponding to the credentials is not enabled.
errors.user_not_found_for_email: There is no user corresponding to the given email.
errors.google_play_services_not_available: Google Play services are not available on this device.
errors.no_such_provider: You do not have this provider linked.
errors.code_expired: The code has expired, please ask for a new code.
errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests, please try again later.
errors.network_error_message: Your device does not have any active internet connection.
errors.unknown_error: An error occurred, please try again later.
errors.general_error_message: Looks like something went wrong. Our team is working on fixing it right now.
errors.general_network_error: A network error has occurred, please check your connection.
errors.credential_already_in_use: These credentials are already associated with a different user account.
errors.email_already_in_use: The email address is already in use by another account.
errors.user_token_expired: Your credentials are no longer valid, please sign in again.
errors.requires_recent_login: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Please sign in again.
errors.same_email: You can’t use the same e-mail.
errors.same_phone_error: You can’t use the same number.

mainnet_landing.header: Ice mining activity has ended. As we gear up for the mainnet launch on October 7th, 2024, keep the app installed for exclusive updates and early access to mainnet app.

roadmap.title: Whitepaper
roadmap.subtitle: Learn more about our vision at Ice.

join_mainnet.title: Join The Decentralized Future
join_mainnet.subtitle: Get a sneak peak of our upcoming Mainnet app and its unique features.
